sp_angular_provider.name: autoFocusScroll

sys_update_version.name: sp_angular_provider_b8d692d3c39cfa1075ea722ed401315c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>autoFocusScroll</name><script><![CDATA[function autoFocusScroll($timeout) {
  return {
    restrict: 'A',
    link: function (scope, element, attrs) {
      var inputField = element.find('input.form-control');
      element.hide();

      element.slideDown(400, function () {
        if (inputField.length > 0) {
          inputField[0].focus();
          inputField[0].scrollIntoView({
            behavior: 'smooth',
            block: 'center'
          });
        }
      });

      scope.$on('$destroy', function () {
        element.slideUp(400);
      });
    }
  };
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 16:36:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>b8d692d3c39cfa1075ea722ed401315c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>autoFocusScroll</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PeerCentral" source="x_1794402_peerce_0">b7f1c56ac397621075ea722ed40131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PeerCentral">b7f1c56ac397621075ea722ed40131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_b8d692d3c39cfa1075ea722ed401315c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-05 17:42:17</sys_updated_on><type>directive</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>
